    • Uses of XmlConfig in com.jayway.restassured.config

      Methods in com.jayway.restassured.config that return XmlConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.and()
      For syntactic sugar.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.declareNamespace(String prefix, String namespaceURI)
      Declares a namespace and also sets namespaceAware(boolean) to true.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.declareNamespaces(Map<String,String> namespacesToDeclare)
      Specify declared namespaces that will be used when parsing XML.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.disableLoadingOfExternalDtd()
      Disables external DTD loading.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.feature(String uri, boolean enabled)
      Set a value of a feature flag.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.features(Map<String,Boolean> features)
      Specify features that will be used when parsing XML.
      XmlConfig RestAssuredConfig.getXmlConfig() 
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.namespaceAware(boolean shouldBeAwareOfNamespaces)
      Configure whether or not REST Assured should be aware of namespaces when parsing XML.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.properties(Map<String,Object> properties)
      Specify properties that will be used when parsing XML.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.property(String name, Object value)
      Set a value of a property.
      XmlConfig XmlConfig.with()
      For syntactic sugar.
      static XmlConfig XmlConfig.xmlConfig()
